high_descs: Turn left and walk to the far end of the counter.
Pick up the perfume bottle.
Turn around and head left to the toilet.
Put the perfume bottle on the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Put a perfume bottle on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the long white a green counter across the room.
Near the middle of the counter top, you will see a white lotion bottle.  Pick it up.
Turn to the right and cross the room to the toilet.
Place the lotion bottle on top of the toilet tank cover.
anns.task_desc: Move a lotion bottle from the counter to the back of the toilet cover.

high_descs: Turn left, walk towards the door, turn right to the counter.
Pick up the bottle bottle with black cap on the counter to the right of the soap.
Turn around, go to the toilet.
Put the bottle on the top of the toilet tank on the left side.
anns.task_desc: Put a bottle on the top of the toilet tank.

high_descs: Move over to the counter in front of the soap.
Pick up the soap from the counter.
Bring the soap over to the toilet.
Put the soap on the toilet lid.
anns.task_desc: Put the soap on the toilet lid.

high_descs: go the counter on your right
pick up the lotion bottle
walk the bottle over to the toilet
put the bottle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: get the lotion and put on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk to the counter.
Pick up the soap dispenser from the counter.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Place the soap dispenser on the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Place a soap dispenser on the toilet.
